faggot: [an extremely offensive word for a gay man]
faggots: [an extremely offensive word for a group of gay men]
nigga: [extremely offensive word for a Black person]
niggas: [extremely offensive word for a group of Black people]
nigger: [extremely offensive word for a Black person]
niggers: [extremely offensive word for a group of Black people]
paki: [an extremely offensive word for a Pakistani person or someone who is thought to be Pakistani]
pakis: [an extremely offensive word for a group of Pakistani people or a group of people who are thought to be Pakistani]
tranny: [an extremely offensive word for a person who is transgender]
trannys: [an extremely offensive word for a group of people who are transgender]
